twist.text: Nash equilibrium isn't always the best outcome.

punchline.text: A Nash equilibrium is where everyone is doing their best.

quiz.question: What defines a Nash equilibrium?
options: Everyone is happy with the outcome
No player can improve their outcome by unilaterally changing their strategy
The outcome is always optimal for all
